title: People's Court: The Case of the Rude Co-Worker
description: Dave claims that Jenny doesn't wave goodbye in a nice way when he leaves everyday.  Jenny claims that she isn't rude but is busy working so she doesn't always give him a big smile.  We have 3 jurors on to decide who's in the wrong.
itunes:summary: Dave claims that Jenny doesn't wave goodbye in a nice way when he leaves everyday.  Jenny claims that she isn't rude but is busy working so she doesn't always give him a big smile.  We have 3 jurors on to decide who's in the wrong.
